column1: The Pit Room////Decided to have lunch at the pit room today with some coworkers.  I ordered a wagyu beef rib and a brisket taco.  I can't say enough good things about the taco.  The rib on the other hand was mostly FULL of fat.  From a ratio perspective
column2: there was more fat than edible meat.  At the price point for the beef rib
column3: this is huge disappointment.  My coworkers work quick to point out the mountain of fat left on my tray.  Bummer.
